title: Chang'e 4
summary: Chang'e 4 (/tʃɑːŋˈə/; Chinese: 嫦娥四号; pinyin: Cháng'é Sìhào; lit. 'Chang'e No. 4') is a robotic spacecraft mission, part of the second phase of the Chinese Lunar Exploration Program.   China achieved humanity's first soft landing on the far side of the Moon, on 3 January 2019.[12][13]
